address"}},"kLast()":{"details":"reserve0 * reserve1, as of immediately after the most recent liquidity event."},"mint(address)":{"details":"Mint liquidity","params":{"recipient":"The address for which the liquidity will be created"},"returns":{"liquidity":"The amount of liquidity tokens was minted"}},"price0CumulativeLast()":{"details":"This value can overflow the output","amount1Out":"The amount of token1 output","data":"Any data to be passed through to the callback","recipient":"The address to receive the output of the swap"}},"token0()":{"returns":{"_0":"The
